post.author: 고상호
post.content:
Hello Brad,
I would like to speak with your regarding a senior J2EE / Weblogic developer role (Permanent position) within a Toronto Insurance firm. Are you currently available to consider new opportunities at this time? I look forward to your response.
Regards,
James Liberi
Senior Account Manager
MIS Consultants
55 Eglinton Ave East, Suite 701
Toronto, Ontario
M4P 1G8
Phone: (416)489-4334, Ext.239
Fax: (416)489-0918
post.title: new opportunity - J2EE Developer
